title: 6th Job is Available Now!
content: After the long Journey Toward the Sixth Star, 6th Job is finally available now!

title: November 2023 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

title: Black Friday 2023 Sales!
content: Take advantage of dozens of deals with new items on sale every day through Cyber Monday!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - November 21, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 4 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Community Livestream - Let's Play Hyperion w/ CM Jade
content: Join Community Manager Jade in the next Community Livestream as she explores the new server, Hyperion, and gets to know the players!

title: New Age Hyper Burning and Burning World!
content: The New Age update is here, and Hyper Burning is back once again until February, with Burning World and Burning World Step Up to take you all the way to Lv. 260!
